abilityEffect.en: The maximum HP for each Lunatone you have in play is now 80.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon for each Lunatone you have in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
